raw_mentions: The binding affinity of the compound according to the invention preferably has a binding affinity (Kd value) to NCAM and/or the NCAM ligand in the range of 10<sup>−3 </sup>to 10<sup>−10 </sup>M, such as preferably in the range of 10<sup>−4 </sup>to 10<sup>−8 </sup>M.

The binding affinity of the compound according to the invention preferably has a binding affinity (Kd value) to NCAM and/or the NCAM ligand in the range of 10<sup>−3 </sup>to 10<sup>−10 </sup>M, such as preferably in the range of 10<sup>−4 </sup>to 10<sup>−8 </sup>M.
